items.sentence: Many people have asked me why I like doing this.
Tom stopped Mary before she could do any damage.
Why don't you come and live with us for a while?
Without the map, we wouldn't have found the way.
I still have a lot of things that I need to buy.
I'm going to stay here with you, no matter what.
That blonde girl with curly hair is from Sweden.
The famous building, the Taj Mahal, is in India.
The company has purchased a new computer system.
You have a choice of black tea, coffee, or milk.
What was it that caused you to change your mind?
The town square turns into a market once a week.
These rules apply to everyone without exception.
Tom has decided to stay for another three weeks.
Tom didn't think that Mary would stay very long.
Don't challenge someone who has nothing to lose.
No country on earth is safe in this nuclear age.
Such a ridiculous superstition no longer exists.
It was the first time that I visited the museum.
What's your favorite thing to eat for breakfast?
I had scarcely walked a minute before I met Tom.
A lot of red flowers are blooming in the garden.
The Beatles gave five concerts in Tokyo in 1996.
Because of my job, I will be in Tokyo next week.
From time to time, he goes to Tokyo on business.
For the holidays, I'm going to Tokyo for a week.
Please don't make the same mistakes that I made.
I won't wash your car for you. Wash it yourself.
Tom cooked the salmon the way Mary asked him to.
I hope that Tom is ready to go when I get there.

I enjoy swimming, but I don't want to swim here.

How many Christmas cards did you send last year?
We should've paid attention to the announcement.
You're not nearly as funny as you seem to think.
How would you describe colors to a blind person?
No one knows for sure when Tom Jackson was born.
I can't believe that you didn't want to do that.
I can't believe that you didn't have to do that.
I can't believe that you didn't need to do that.

I think Tom and I'll be doing that by ourselves.
Tom said he thinks that there's no life on Mars.
Tom said he hopes that you won't let Mary drive.
Many people around here don't understand French.
My shoes are worn out. I need to buy a new pair.
I'm accustomed to studying French every evening.
I'm afraid that I might have trouble doing that.
No matter how drunk you were, Goethe was a poet!
